name: @voiceflow/natural-language-commander

0.2.0.name: @voiceflow/natural-language-commander
0.2.0.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify ./dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-runtime ] ] --standalone NLC | derequire > dist/nlc.js && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js
